metadata.name: Soul Birds Drop (EKS-X) - ACCESS PASS
metadata.description:
Get the limited access pass for the anticipated Metaverse-Sneaker Drop featuring RCR! (All Sneakers will be wearable on 2D for Social-Media & in Metaverse.)


With this pass you get:

- Invitation to the launch event in Decentraland (limited to 100)

- 48h access to the exxclusive sneaker collection wearable in multiple metaverses!

- A special surprise airdropped to 5/100 ticket holders ðŸ¤«
